name: UpdateTimeClockEvent
description:
Update the time clock event for a specified ID.

Use this tool to replace an existing time clock event with new data for a specified ID. Ensure to specify only one of the fields: timeEntryCode, project, or projectPlanTask. This tool is secured by Time Clock Event REST API's and is under the Time Tracking scope.

parameters.name: workday_resource_id
parameters.description: The unique Workday ID for updating the time clock event.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: time_clock_event_data
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the new time clock event data. Only specify one: timeEntryCode, project, or projectPlanTask.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
